title: RELIC Ending Explained!
author: Think Story
comment: With Chuck'e'Cheese going out of business pretty sure those animatronics gonna be looking like that old lady soon 🍕

This movie messed me up. I lost my dad to Alzheimer's, and the slow decline is so much more painful than losing someone to a random act, or something quick. It's like watching someone waste away from cancer. All you can do is love them and be present until they're gone. Slow suffering is true horror.
I just finished movie and straight away to here to know wtf did I just watch
My grandmother died of dementia and I take after her, even my health takes after her. This movie spoke volumes to me. I’m glad I was there for her, she was a wonderful person.

Over the years we’ve had problems with mold. We’ve fought what I thought was a good fight. But after watching relic I know now that we must not give in we must be brave and work tirelessly to never let mold take over.
description:
In this video we take a deep dive, review, recap and explain the ending to Australia's latest horror movie on demand RELIC starring Emily Mortimer, Robyn Nevin, and Bella Heathcote.
